attributes.action: discuss exe members of parliment becoming members of the european parliment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it has come to my notice that exe mps are taking up eu seats this could be a conflict of interest or would seem to me to be reward for failure at best and a bribe at worst in fact it could be the aim of some mps to be there rather than serve here to correct any ambiguity i believe that this practice should be at least subject to debate about in the house

rejection.details: This would be a matter for Paliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
